products.title: Numark Mixtrack Pro 3
products.content: A portable two-deck DJ controller with built-in sound card, two mixing channels, Prime Loops Remix Toolkit, auto/manual looping and sample playback.
pros: Great for beginners and intermediate users
cons: Full version of Serato is a separate purchase

highlights.Connectivity: RCA, ¼” and 1/8” headphone, ¼” microphone, USB 2.0

products.title: Native Instruments Traktor Kontrol X1 MkII
products.content: A fantastic DJ controller with 2 FX decks, RGB cue point trigger buttons, 7-segment displays, LED indicators and reactive encoders.
cons: No light Traktor LE software included

products.title: Reloop AMS-NEON
products.content: A four-deck DJ controller with 8 intuitive performance modes, new Flip mode and 5 different trigger variants per sample slot.
pros: Great for Serato Pro DJ users
cons: Requires MIDI map for other DJ applications

products.title: Numark DJ2GO2
products.content: A two-deck DJ controller with two channels, on-board audio interface and standard MIDI mapping.

highlights.Connectivity: 1/8” headphone output, 1/8” main output, USB, 1/8” RCA

products.title: SKP Pro Audio SMX-800
products.content: A user-friendly DJ controller with two channels, built-in high-quality sound card and ultra-low distortion.
cons: Audio problems reported by some users

best_product.justification: The Numark Mixtrack Pro 3 is selected as the best product due to its high overall rating (9.8), excellent performance (9.9), and great balance of features, including a built-in sound card, two mixing channels, and Prime Loops Remix Toolkit. It is also portable and functional, making it suitable for beginners and intermediate users.

comparison.reviews_summary: Portable and functional, great for beginners and intermediate users, with easy mapping and play/cue buttons.

comparison.product_name: Native Instruments Traktor Kontrol X1 MkII
comparison.reviews_summary: Refined design and build quality, easy setup and use, great for controlling Traktor software.
Durable and easy to use, great for Serato Pro DJ users, with 8 intuitive performance modes.

specs_comparison.connectivity: 1/8” headphone output, 1/8” main output, USB, 1/8” RCA

comparison.reviews_summary: Portable and lightweight, easy to use and navigate, great for beginners.
Easy to understand and use, basic functions are present, great for learning.
